Description: Shoulder sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) black-figured pottery dinos(?); light brown clay with some white inclusions; interior reserved; exterior slipped cream; animal frieze (lion attacking a wild goat patches of red paint on lion and on goat) with zone of pendant palmettes above; minimal part of lower frieze preserved; friezes separated by bands with added red bands lined in white.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.415)
